Sorry if I wasn't clear - I typed that at break :)

Hydras and Rodimus are =
in Security while Nightshift and Scorponok are
in the throne room.  Rodimus=
 and Hydras are only watching Nightshift
and Scorponok via security cameras=
 and such, as they discuss things.
Cyclonus' call came to Hydras the securi=
ty room, so Nightshift should
still be unaware that Hydras knows anything. =
:)

I hope that helps :)

Preston

 Carroll
